body:
I'm not learning go. If you see the example, it *clearly* demonstrates that I fully comprehend the problem, I just figured it was *smart* to avoid *panicking* in a *core library*.

I have pedigree you guys are familiar with in the golang community, but I'm not just going to sell myself to you to stop being explained golang like i'm 5.

This whole conversation is ridiculously condescending. I'm going to unsubscribe now. Read the links next time.
